petSpace.desc: This website is the result of a challenge organized for the 'No Country' organization, I was in charge of the front end. The main target of this project is reunite lost missing pets with their owners. Tools and libraries used: useContext, Leaflet map, React Hook Form, Yup, styled Component, eslint, lodash, react router dom, axios.

estafaMLibre.desc: This is the Mercado LibreÂ´s evil version. Built by a team of 3/4 members, my tasks were to create the landing page and footer. Testing up to 80%. Tools and libraries used: Redux Toolkit, classnames, React Hook Form, Yup, eslint, react router dom, axios, bootstrap.

rollflix.desc: Just a Netflix clone, final project for the full stack course in 'Rolling Code School' using MERN stack.
